title: How long is it going to take to unlock my honor level
body: It has been 2 weeks since my restricton got lifted and I played at least 70+ games with positive behaviour (pretty sure I would be banned already if I wasnt) and my honor level is still locked. How much do I need to grind it????

replies.body: There isn't a set amount of time or honors! It sounds like your'e on the right track though, which is great. Keep up the good behavior and you'll get those honors and rewards back before you know it.
This really doesn't answer the question. There should be a set amount of time/honors or some kind of indication that when it's going to be lifted to encourage playing without any rewards

> [{quoted}](name=GoldPikaKnight,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=3pFAp1RW,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-08-26T23:59:59.418+0000)
>
> There isn't a set amount of time or honors! It sounds like your'e on the right track though, which is great. Keep up the good behavior and you'll get those honors and rewards back before you know it.

Hello. I already unlocked my rewards long time ago but I am still dishonorable. I play a lot almost every day. Some people said they got from dishonorable to honor 4 in a month, yet after 3 weeks of unlocking rewards I am still dushonorable. I miss geting keys...
Mines locked too and I was an honor five. They haven't unlocked mine either and people honor me every game.
